How are your two operating models different - Autopilot and Subscription?
![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/66c63d9b7dca41affc7eac1b/66c63d9c7dca41affc7eacc9_Plus.svg)

The account manager again ensures that all rounds of interviews are scheduled without any drop-offs (you would be surprised how many candidates get generally missed/dropped-off because of delays/lapses in interview scheduling; hence we take care of it). In Subscription model, we provide you access to our database, where you can use smart filters on our platform to find the candidates yourself. The ones you "Show interest" to - will be emailed, whatsapped and called by Weekday. You get all responses on your mailbox where you can reply yourself and schedule interviews with ones you like.
Why do you charge 15% success fee on your "Autopilot" model when other agencies are cheaper?
